content: Just wondered whether anyone has considered carrying the prescribing organisation/clinician in the MedicationStatement resource? A use case is to be able to query the medication (contraindications, dosage etc) with the prescriber.

There is an extension (http://hl7-fhir.github.io/extension-medicationstatement-prescriber.html) for the prescriber, which resulted from this discussion https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/implementers/topic/prescriber.20for.20MedicationStatement
